languages.text: Направить часть десятины на благоустройство столицы: еду сытым, веревку бедным, золото богатым (или наоборот :) )

traits.locale_text: Направить часть десятины на благоустройство столицы: еду сытым, веревку бедным, золото богатым (или наоборот :) )

languages.text: Невероятное богатство находится в руках династии фон Валанциус — и ему суждено стать фундаментом для великих планов Вольного Торговца. Даргонус будет перестроен в торговый и политический центр сектора, откуда его сиятельн{mf|ый|ная} влады{mf|ка|чица} распространит свою волю на весь Коронус.

The incredible wealth now possessed by House von Valancius is to lay the foundations of the Rogue Trader's grand designs. Dargonus will be refashioned into the commercial and political heart of the sector, from whence its eminent ruler will project {mf|his|her} power all across the Expanse.
languages.original_text: Невероятное богатство находится в руках династии фон Валанциус — и ему суждено стать фундаментом для великих планов Вольного Торговца. Даргонус будет перестроен в торговый и политический центр сектора, откуда его сиятельн{mf|ый|ная} влады{mf|ка|чица} распространит свою волю на весь Коронус.

traits.locale_text: The incredible wealth possessed by House von Valancius is to lay the foundation of the Rogue Trader's grand designs. Dargonus will be refashioned into the commercial and political heart of the sector, from which its eminent ruler will project {mf|his|her} power all across the Expanse.

The incredible wealth now possessed by House von Valancius is to lay the foundations of the Rogue Trader's grand designs. Dargonus will be refashioned into the commercial and political heart of the sector, from whence its eminent ruler will project {mf|his|her} power all across the Expanse.

The incredible wealth now possessed by House von Valancius is to lay the foundations of the Rogue Trader's grand designs. Dargonus will be refashioned into the commercial and political heart of the sector, from whence its eminent ruler will project {mf|his|her} power all across the Expanse.

The incredible wealth now possessed by House von Valancius is to lay the foundations of the Rogue Trader's grand designs. Dargonus will be refashioned into the commercial and political heart of the sector, from whence its eminent ruler will project {mf|his|her} power all across the Expanse.

languages.text: 冯·瓦兰修斯如今拥有着难以计数的财富，这些数量惊人的财富为行商浪人的宏伟计划奠定了坚实的基础。达戈努斯将会成为整个科罗努斯扩区的商业、政治中心，而它无与伦比的统治者将会稳居此地，将{mf|他|她}的影响力辐射到整个星区。
languages.original_text: The incredible wealth now possessed by House von Valancius is to lay the foundations of the Rogue Trader's grand designs. Dargonus will be refashioned into the commercial and political heart of the sector, from whence its eminent ruler will project {mf|his|her} power all across the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 冯·瓦兰修斯如今拥有着难以计数的财富，这些数量惊人的财富为行商浪人的宏伟计划奠定了坚实的基础。达戈努斯将会成为整个科罗努斯扩区的商业、政治中心，而它无与伦比的统治者将会稳居此地，将{mf|他|她}的影响力辐射到整个星区。

languages.text: フォン・ヴァランシウス家が今や手にしている驚異的な富は、ローグトレーダーの壮大な計画の基盤となるだろう。ダルゴナスは、この星域の商業的かつ政治的な中心地へと再構築され、その卓越した支配者は辺域全体にその権力を行使することになるだろう。
languages.original_text: The incredible wealth now possessed by House von Valancius is to lay the foundations of the Rogue Trader's grand designs. Dargonus will be refashioned into the commercial and political heart of the sector, from whence its eminent ruler will project {mf|his|her} power all across the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: フォン・ヴァランシウス家が今や手にしている驚異的な富は、ローグトレーダーの壮大な計画の基盤となるだろう。ダルゴナスは、この星域の商業的かつ政治的な中心地へと再構築され、その卓越した支配者は辺域全体にその権力を行使することになるだろう。

languages.text: Der unglaubliche Reichtum, den das Haus Valancius nun besitzt, soll das Fundament für die großen Pläne {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} legen. Dargonus wird zum kommerziellen und politischen Herzen des Sektors umgestaltet, und von dort aus wird {mf|sein angesehener Herrscher|seine angesehene Herrscherin} in der gesamten Ausdehnung an Macht gewinnen.
languages.original_text: The incredible wealth now possessed by House von Valancius is to lay the foundations of the Rogue Trader's grand designs. Dargonus will be refashioned into the commercial and political heart of the sector, from whence its eminent ruler will project {mf|his|her} power all across the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Der unglaubliche Reichtum, den das Haus Valancius nun besitzt, soll das Fundament für die großen Pläne {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} legen. Dargonus wird zum kommerziellen und politischen Herzen des Sektors umgestaltet, und von dort aus wird {mf|sein angesehener Herrscher|seine angesehene Herrscherin} in der gesamten Ausdehnung an Macht gewinnen.

languages.text: Von Valancius Hanesi'nin artık elinde bulundurduğu akıl almaz servet, Hür Tacir'in görkemli tasarılarının temeli olacak. Dargonus, sektörün ticari ve siyasi kalbine dönüştürülerek yüce hükümdarının kudretini Enginlik'in dört bir yanına yansıtacağı bir mihver hâline getirilecek.
languages.original_text: The incredible wealth now possessed by House von Valancius is to lay the foundations of the Rogue Trader's grand designs. Dargonus will be refashioned into the commercial and political heart of the sector, from whence its eminent ruler will project {mf|his|her} power all across the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Von Valancius Hanesi'nin artık elinde bulundurduğu akıl almaz servet, Hür Tacir'in görkemli tasarılarının temeli olacak. Dargonus, sektörün ticari ve siyasi kalbine dönüştürülerek yüce hükümdarının kudretini Enginlik'in dört bir yanına yansıtacağı bir mihver hâline getirilecek.

languages.text: La increíble riqueza que ahora posee la casa von Valancius sentará los cimientos de los grandes proyectos de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Dargonus se convertirá en el corazón comercial y político del sector, desde donde su ilustre gobernante proyectará su poder por toda la Extensión.
languages.original_text: The incredible wealth now possessed by House von Valancius is to lay the foundations of the Rogue Trader's grand designs. Dargonus will be refashioned into the commercial and political heart of the sector, from whence its eminent ruler will project {mf|his|her} power all across the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: La increíble riqueza que ahora posee la casa von Valancius sentará los cimientos de los grandes proyectos de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Dargonus se convertirá en el corazón comercial y político del sector, desde donde su ilustre gobernante proyectará su poder por toda la Extensión.

languages.text: L'incroyable richesse que la maison von Valancius s'est appropriée servira à poser les fondations des ambitieux projets {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Dargonus deviendra le cœur commercial et politique du secteur, ainsi que le siège du pouvoir que son {mf|éminent dirigeant|éminente dirigeante} exercera sur toutes les Étendues.
languages.original_text: The incredible wealth now possessed by House von Valancius is to lay the foundations of the Rogue Trader's grand designs. Dargonus will be refashioned into the commercial and political heart of the sector, from whence its eminent ruler will project {mf|his|her} power all across the Expanse.

Dargonus deviendra le cœur commercial et politique du secteur, ainsi que le siège du pouvoir que son {mf|éminent dirigeant|éminente dirigeante} exercera sur toutes les Étendues.
